Pages displayed by the program¶

This chapter shows all the pages displayed by the program. All the pages are managed by a controller, a tkinter.Tk instance.

Module page_main¶

Page definition for the main controller page (Tk instance) controlling all the other Frames. Also defines the Data class which contains all the data provided by the user, and the program results.

class src.page_main.Data(working_dir)[source]¶

Object containing all the gathered user data and the results

Attributes:
working_dir (str):
Location of the folder of the files
file_data (dict):

Keys are chosen file names, whose values are dictionaries whose keys once provided in DisplayFilesPage are:

  • loc (str): absolute path of the file
  • nbFA (StringVar): number of FA for this file
  • FAmass (StringVar): FA mass for this file
choice (dict):
Contains information regarding user choices
error_input(user_choice)[source]¶

Check if input data errors were made in DisplayFilesPage

Arguments:
user_choice (str):
‘decay’ for decay power curve generation, or ‘source’ for source terms inventories generation
Returns:
(error, msg) (tuple):
  • error (bool): True if an error is detected
  • msg (str): error message to be printed in the message box
generate_power()[source]¶

Generate decay power curve

Returns:
df (pandas.DataFrame):
Contains the resulting decay power values for all the available time steps and the following sigma values: [0, 1.645, 2, 3]
generate_source()[source]¶

Generate source terms inventories

Returns:
dict_df (dict):
  • 1st key (str): categories (‘Elements’ or ‘Isotopes’)
  • 2nd key (str): units (‘g’, ‘bq’, ‘wt’, ‘wg’)
  • 2nd key values (pandas.DataFrame): source terms inventories for the corresponding category, unit. All the available time steps and elements/isotopes are considered. The user will later choose what time steps and elements/isotopes to consider in the final inventories
get_grp_ioe(category)[source]¶

Get the available groups and elements/isotopes in the source terms inventories dictionary for the corresponding category

Arguments:
category (str):
“Elements” or “Isotopes”
Returns:
get_dict_group_ioe (dict):
Dictionary whose keys are the contained group, and values are the sorted list of isotopes or elements contained in this group
class src.page_main.MainPage(data)[source]¶

Main application, refered to as controller in the different frames

check_user_data()[source]¶
Check the data and choices provided by the user. If:
  • choice[‘decay’][‘bool’] == 1 then decay power curve is generated first
  • choice[‘source’][‘bool’] == 1 then source terms inventories are generated for the corresponding categories and units
raise_displayer_files()[source]¶

Display the data (file names) chosen in the ChooseFilesPage. Raise DisplayFilesPage

raise_elements_isotopes()[source]¶

Raise the elements or isotopes choice page

show_frame(container, *args)[source]¶

Show next frame to be displayed

Module page_choose_files¶

Page for files to post-process choice.

class src.page_choose_files.ChooseFilesPage(parent, controller, *files)[source]¶

Page for output files choice

select_all()[source]¶

Select all the file names

unselect_all()[source]¶

Unselect all the file names

update_list()[source]¶

Update the list while doing the search with the filter Warning: the selection is reset when the listbox is updated!

Module page_display_files¶

Page displaying the files chosen by the user, and enables giving the data needed for each file post-processing.

class src.page_display_files.DisplayFilesPage(parent, controller, file_names)[source]¶

Display the files chosen in ChooseFilesPage, and ask the user the data to be used with each file

init_UI()[source]¶

Create GUI for the chosen files and its corresponding data to be provided

Module page_decay_power_curve¶

Page for decay power curve plotting. The user can visualize the best-estimate decay power curve with the curves penalized with 1.645, 2 and 3 sigma uncertainty values for all the available time steps. The user can zoom and save images.

class src.page_decay_power_curve.DecayPowerCurvePage(parent, controller, *args)[source]¶

Plotting of the decay power curves

Module page_choose_time_steps¶

Page displaying all the available time steps for source terms inventories.

class src.page_choose_time_steps.ChooseTimeStepsPage(parent, controller, *args)[source]¶

Choice of the time steps for source terms inventories generation

after_time_steps()[source]¶

After time steps choice for source terms inventories, raise the page corresponding to the user choice: elements choice page then/or isotopes choice page

init_UI()[source]¶

Create main GUI window

Module pages_elements_isotopes_choice¶

Pages for choice of elements and isotopes for source terms inventories.

class src.pages_elements_isotopes_choice.ElementsPage(parent, controller, *args)[source]¶

Choice of the elements for source terms inventories generation

after_elements()[source]¶

Process tests, write elements inventory results and display next Frame depending on user choices

select_all(*args)[source]¶

Select all elements from all groups

unselect_all(*args)[source]¶

Unselect all elements from all groups

class src.pages_elements_isotopes_choice.IsotopesPage(parent, controller, *args)[source]¶

Choice of the isotopes for source terms inventories generation

after_isotopes()[source]¶

Process tests, write isotopes inventory results and display next Frame depending on user choices

select_all(*args)[source]¶

Select all isotopes from all groups

unselect_all(*args)[source]¶

Unselect all isotopes from all groups
